title: Take Down Tobacco App
description: App designed to help solve the crisis of widespread ignorance of harm caused by tobacco among teens and the lack of incentivization to avoid consuming tobacco.

title: P3 APCS Attendance App
description: Customizable iOS app for making attendance more easier especially when students may not be sitting in their assigned seat.

title: MobilityHub
description: iOS medical service finder app that utilizes NLP to recommend medical centers from user-specified symptoms or conditions based on relevance and proximity.

title: SKIB
description: Unique approach to getting better at public speaking with LLM feedback, audio transcription, and Fast Fourier.

title: FRC Scouting website
description: Collaborative project management tool with real-time updates and team collaboration features.

title: VisionARy
description: Tool for helping people test their eyesight, choosing glasses they like, and trying them out in AR.

title: Food4All
description: Tool for communication between food donors and volunteers who are willing to deliver the food to people in need.

title: FRCScout App
description: Allows teams to efficiently collect and store scoring, speed, and measurement data of other teams during competitions without wifi.

title: Instagram Unfollower Report
description: Give users a list of people who don't follow them back and people they don't follow back on Instagram.

title: Molar Mass Calculator
description: Calculates the molar mass of a given compound. Works for an element, binary compound, and multiple compounds.

title: OCR Based File Search Utility
description: Looks through the files of a directory for user-specified string queries. Then creates a new folder with result files.

title: Applied ML Object Detection
description: Object detection program for self-driving cars developed with YOLOv5 and OpenCV
